website_summaries.verdict: The Grain Free line is made with real foods easily digested by dogs. Merrick swapped out common fillers like corn and grain with healthy options, such as peas, sweet potatoes, apples, and blueberries.
pros: Nutrient-rich venison is the first ingredient
Includes quality whole foods without preservatives
There is a variety for dogs of all sizes and ages
cons: This healthy dog food isn't cheap

customer_reviews.title: Too rich for my Dobermans and has poultry
customer_reviews.text: My dobermans do not tolerate chicken so this gave them runs . I should have read ingredients closer. I do feed Merrick just not this flavor anymore
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Preece

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: I love the Merrick dog food collections. I have had lots of friends switch over to this brand because their dogs love it and will actually eat. I can even switch from their different flavors and "collections" and my dog doesn't get sick like you would having to ease them into a new type/brand of food.
customer_reviews.author: CSpare

customer_reviews.title: Legit product dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: We have used this brand for a long time it works great for all our dogs and keeps us away from the newest don’t give your dogs sweet potatoes warning. It’s the same price on amazon as the store but more convenient this way for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Zeigler

customer_reviews.title: Dogs seem to like it Ok without health problems
customer_reviews.text: Dogs seem to like it Ok without health problems. It seems a bit pricey but I’d rather pay more and feel like they are getting quality food. I make them some food with meat, rice, and veggies in addition to the dry food.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry W.

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product
customer_reviews.text: This is all I'll feed my dog. I change up the flavors between Texas Beef, and the Chicken, and salmon, didn't like the nasty gas he got when u have him the BackCountry
customer_reviews.author: awisewoman

customer_reviews.title: My dogs seem to like it best with the addition of the canned stuff
customer_reviews.text: I changed over from another brand and tried this. My dogs seem to like it best with the addition of the canned stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Glenna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it because my dogs love it and are healthier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Howie

customer_reviews.title: Merrick/ auto-ship dog food
customer_reviews.text: Subscription takes to long. Faster and cheaper on other sites. Couldn't tell you how it tastes...my dog can't talk.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Arkell

customer_reviews.title: Watch the bag size!
customer_reviews.text: I like Merrick products and have no issues wih the food. However I ordered a "25lb bag" on Amazon and the bag is only 22lbs. Merrick does not have a 25lbs size but I didnt realize it until 2 purchases later.
customer_reviews.author: Kacy T

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this more than other brands. I ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this more than other brands. I switch back to a different brand because of some shipping delays but the dog gave me a little sideways look when I put the other food down.
customer_reviews.author: Dyana

product_meta.title: Merrick Grain Free Dry Dog Food Recipe
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Real Venison| Size:12 PoundThe Merrick Grain Free dog food story is one of superior nutrition, delicious taste and using the highest quality ingredients. It’s about staying true to our roots and staying put in our original Hereford, Texas, USA kitchen—the one where Garth Merrick started our company and where we still hand craft our natural dog food recipes today. All Merrick Grain Free dry dog food recipes start with real deboned meat and real whole foods like sweet potatoes, blueberries, peas and more to provide natural dog food nutrition that’s complete and balanced—with leading levels of quality protein, plus Omega-6 and Omega-3 fatty acids to ensure great looking, healthy skin and coat.
feature_bullets: #1 INGREDIENT: DEBONED MEAT, FISH OR POULTRY: Merrick Grain Free dog food recipes contain leading levels of high quality proteins for healthy energy levels, building muscle mass and a great taste your dog will love.

HEALTHY SKIN AND COAT, HIPS AND JOINTS: These grain free dog food recipes contain leading levels of Omega-3 and 6 fatty acids to support healthy skin and coat plus leading levels of glucosamine and chondroitin to maintain your dog's hip and joint function.

REAL WHOLE FOODS FOR OPTIMAL NATURAL NUTRITION: Merrick Grain Free dog food recipes include real, whole foods like sweet potatoes, peas, apples, blueberries and contain zero preservatives, fillers, corn, wheat, soy or gluten

At Merrick, we promise your pet will not only love the taste of our natural dog food, they’ll be happier and healthier, too. That’s why if you (or your pet) are not 100%, absolutely, totally, completely satisfied with Merrick Grain Free dog food, return it for your money back. We don’t just make the best food ever. We stand behind it.

A VARIETY FOR EVERY BREED AND NEED: Merrick Grain Free dog food offers a range of specially crafted recipes to nourish all types of dogs, offering: puppy food, senior dog food, large breed dog food, and an option for those dogs needing a little help to maintain a healthy weight.
